DOC.brief_summary: `` Cardiovascular Imaging Biomarker Analyses ( CIBER ) '' single-center , prospective observational study evaluate expression novel biomarkers patient undergo cardiacvascular imaging within clinical routine care . It aim evaluate association biomarker expression ascertain cardiac imaging parameter .
DOC.detailed_description: `` Cardiovascular Imaging Biomarker Analyses ( CIBER ) '' single-center , prospective observational study evaluate expression novel biomarkers patient undergo cardiacvascular imaging within clinical routine care . It aim evaluate association biomarker expression ascertain cardiac imaging parameter . Furthermore prognostic value biomarkers image parameter mid-term long-term prognosis evaluate . Novel biomarkers comprise blood derive biomarkers include neurohormone , protein , cytokine , microRNAs metabolomics .
DOC.criteria: patient low intermediate risk coronary artery disease 18 year mechanical heart valve pulmonary embolism deep vein thrombosis myocardial infarction within last 3 month electrical cardioversion within 30 day status heart transplant transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) stroke within last 30 day intracerebral bleeding within last 2 month acute infection exist plan pregnancy chronic kidney disease eGFR < 40 ml/min
